*,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box}body{margin:0}img{max-width:100%;height:auto}ul[class]{padding:0;margin:0;list-style:none}p{margin:0}a{text-decoration:none}a,body{color:#fcf5cf}body{background:#212620;font-family:Libre Franklin,sans-serif}.btn-cta{color:#ff5900;display:flex;align-items:center;gap:1em;font-weight:700;transition:transform .3s cubic-bezier(.68,-.33,.87,1.81);transform-origin:bottom right}.btn-cta:focus:not(.btn-cta.uppercase),.btn-cta:hover:not(.btn-cta.uppercase){color:#ff7c35;transform:scale(1.25)}.btn-cta.uppercase{text-transform:uppercase}.btn-cta.uppercase:focus,.btn-cta.uppercase:hover{color:#ff7c35;transform:skewX(-.06turn)}.logo{width:min-content;margin:0;font-size:1.5rem}.logo,.title{font-family:Sedgwick auto;padding:1em;max-width:1200px;min-height:20vh;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(315px,1fr));justify-items:center;gap:2em}header{background:#212620;padding:2em
